title: hari bhakutiya
sahitya:
hari bhakutiya hari bhakutiya savi sukhavu anubhavigaLallade 
mikka narakurigaLadara savi ballave rangayya


caraNam 1    eseve tenginakAya ettu melaballude rasabharita kabba kuri saviyaballude pashu 
kareda pAlu shishu savivandadali A baLiyallidda uNNigaLu saviya ballave rangayya
    caraNam 2    sale candra kiraNake cakOra kuNivandadali uLida pakSigaLadhara savi ballave sarasija 
parimaLava madhukaranu savivandadali A baLiyalidda kappegaLu saviya ballave rangayya 
    caraNam 3    nandA dIpada beLaga mUDha mati ballane andhakanu Adisalu adhara savi ballane 
canda muttina hAra kapiyiDalu ballude endendu purandara viTTala ninagallade
